algorithm_technique: Two-pass approach: first pass to calculate total decoded length, second pass to find the character at index k.
problem_summary_simple: Find the k-th character of a decoded string where digits repeat previous string segments.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate the total length of the decoded string by iterating through the encoded string, then backtrack to find the k-th character.
key_insights: The decoded string can be extremely long, so direct decoding is not feasible.
The problem can be solved by first calculating the total length of the decoded string.
Then, by iterating backward through the encoded string, we can determine which segment the k-th character belongs to and find it.
